articles.description: Italian news website Fanpage.it published photos it says were taken at lunchtime on Sunday of the Milan forward with friends, including former team-mate Ignazio Abate, all without masks.
articles.content: Zlatan Ibrahimovic was reportedly pictured in a Milan restaurant over the weekend while the city was in a coronavirus lockdown as the AC Milan striker once again hit the headlines for his actions off… [+2416 chars]

articles.author: Adam Jones
articles.title: Carlo Ancelotti confirms extent of Jean-Philippe Gbamin Everton injury and ligament damage fears - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Carlo Ancelotti has confirmed that Jean-Philippe Gbamin's season is over after suffering an injury in Everton training, with the midfielder ready to have a scan on the issue on Tuesday
articles.content:
Carlo Ancelotti has confirmed that Jean-Philippe Gbamin's season is over after suffering potential medial ligament damage in Everton training.
The Blues confirmed on Monday afternoon that the 25-yea… [+1201 chars]

articles.author: Daniel Matthews
articles.title: Leicester's James Maddison wanted everyone talking about him but now it's for all the wrong reasons - Daily Mail
articles.description: DANIEL MATTHEWS: It emerged that Maddison was one of three Leicester players dropped over a breach of coronavirus regulations. For the 24-year-old, the timing could hardly have been worse.
articles.content:
Back in September 2019, James Maddison stood in the darkened corner of a vast warehouse and explained what kept him the right side of a thin divide.
